
debian_package_list.txt


cyboi.deb
- depends: libc6, xlibs, libxml2
- suggests: cybop-doc, cybop-core
- category: interpreters
- files:    CYBOI Binary file in usr/share/bin
            /etc/cyboi/config.cybol
            /usr/share/doc/cyboi/README.Debian
            /usr/share/doc/cyboi/changelog.gz
            /usr/share/doc/cyboi/copyright

cyboi-dev.deb
- depends: cyboi, (xlibs-dev,) libxml2-dev
- recommends: cybop-doc
- category: devel
- files: Makefile etc. in /admin

cyboi-doc.deb
- suggests: cyboi
- category: doc
- files: Documentation, Papers, Presentations etc. in /doc

----------

cybol-core.deb
- depends: cyboi
- suggests: cybol-healthcare
- category: misc
- files: CYBOL Core Files in /lib/cybop/core

cybol-healthcare.deb
- depends: cybol-core
- suggests: res_medicinae
- category: misc ("health" gibt's leider nicht)
- files: CYBOL Healthcare Files in /lib/cybop/healthcare

resmedicinae.deb
- depends: cybol-healthcare
- category: misc ("health" gibt's leider nicht)
- file: CYBOL Files, Res Medicinae Anwendung in /lib/resmedicinae

/home/cybop/dist/deb/cyboi_0.4.0.0_i386/*
/home/cybop/dist/deb/cyboi-doc_0.4.0.0_i386/*
/home/cybop/dist/deb/cyboi-dev_0.4.0.0_i386/*
/home/cybop/dist/deb/cybol-core_1.0.0.0/*
/home/cybop/dist/deb/cybol-healthcare_1.0.0.0/*

/etc/cyboi/config.cybol
